headline: Is Coinbase Global (COIN) Pricing In Too Much Crypto Optimism After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: Wondering if Coinbase Global at around US$216.95 is priced for crypto optimism or already baking in too much enthusiasm? This article walks through the key signals that can help you frame that question for yourself. The stock has seen a 10% decline over the last 7 days, an 8.4% decline over 30 days, an 8.3% decline year to date, and a 27.2% decline over 1 year. Over 3 years it is up by a very large amount at around 3.5x. Recent news coverage around Coinbase Global has continued to focus on...
